revisions.rev:
{{pp-semi-protected|small=yes}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Jaden Smith | image= Jaden Smith.jpg | size = 75 px | caption = Smith at the Nobel Peace Prize Concert, December 11, 2009 | birth_name = Jaden Christopher Syre Smith | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1998|7|8}} | birth_place = [[Malibu, California|Malibu]], California, US | occupation = Actor, Artist, songwriter, dancer | yearsactive = 2003âpresent | associated_acts = [[Justin Bieber]], [[Willow Smith]] | background=solo_singer }} '''Jaden Christopher Syre Smith''' (born July 8, 1998){{Cite news|last=Nepales|first=Janet Susan|coauthors=|title=Jackie Chan on Jaden Smith: âIf he stays with me in China for 3 months, he will be a big starâ|pages=|publisher=Manila Bulletin|date=June 13, 2010|url=http://www.mb.com.ph/articles/261904/jackie-chan-jaden-smith-if-he-stays-with-me-china-3-months-he-will-be-a-big-star|accessdate=October 29, 2010}}{{Cite news|last=The Associated Press|first=|coauthors=|title=Today in History|pages=|publisher=Seattle Times|date=June 29, 2009|url=http://seattletimes.nwsource.com/html/nationworld/2009397550_aphistoryjuly8.html|accessdate=October 29, 2010}} is an American child actor, [[rap artist|rapper]], songwriter, dancer, and the son of [[Will Smith]] and [[Jada Pinkett Smith]]. He is the elder brother of singer [[Willow Smith]]. His breakthrough role was in the 2006 film ''[[The Pursuit of Happyness]]'', and he has also starred in the [[remake]]s of ''[[The Day the Earth Stood Still (2008 film)|The Day the Earth Stood Still]]'' and ''[[The Karate Kid (2010 film)|The Karate Kid]]''. ==Career== Jaden Smith made his film debut in the 2006 film ''[[The Pursuit of Happyness]]'' as Christopher, the son of Will Smith's character, Chris Gardner.{{cite news|title=Jackie Chan praises kung fu of Will Smith's son|url=http://www.google.com/hostednews/ap/article/ALeqM5gv6vArHdsb65kFMX1hAeC25Uum1QD99GK8E00|accessdate=July 21, 2009|agency=Associated Press}} For his role, Smith won the award for the Best Breakthrough Performance at the [[2007 MTV Movie Awards]]. At the [[79th Academy Awards]], Smith presented the award for the Best Animated Short and the Best Live Action Short, along with acting nominee [[Abigail Breslin]]. Smith next appeared as Jacob in the 2008 [[Scott Derrickson]] science fiction film, ''[[The Day the Earth Stood Still (2008 film)|The Day the Earth Stood Still]]'', a remake of the [[The Day the Earth Stood Still (1951 film)|1951 classic of the same name]] In 2010, along with [[Jackie Chan]], Smith starred in ''[[The Karate Kid (2010 film)|The Karate Kid]]'', a remake of the [[The Karate Kid (1984 film)|1984 film]].[http://movies.tvguide.com/Movie-News/Jaden-Smith-Karate-58417.aspx Jaden Smith to Take On ''Karate Kid'' Redo]" ''[[TV Guide]]'' with Jackie Chan. November 11, 2008. Retrieved on November 12, 2008. Smith rapped alongside Canadian singer [[Justin Bieber]] in the song "[[Never Say Never (Justin Bieber song)|Never Say Never]]".[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Z5-P9v3F8w Justin Bieber â Never Say Never ft. Jaden Smith]. YouTube. Retrieved on May 1, 2011. He will also be featured in the 2012 film Amulet. His character will be called Navin. ==Personal life== Smith was born in [[Malibu, California|Malibu]], California to actors [[Will Smith]] and [[Jada Pinkett Smith]]. He has an older half-brother, [[Trey Smith]], and a younger sister, [[Willow Smith]]. On his father's side, he is [[African-American]], and on his mother's side, he is of [[Caribbean|West Indian]], [[Creole peoples|Creole]], and [[Spanish and Portuguese Jews|Portuguese-Jewish]] descent. Smith was [[homeschooling|homeschooled]],{{cite web|last=Henderson|first=Kathy|title=Jada Pinkett Smith's Juggling Act|year=2005|url=http://www.parents.com/family-life/celebrity-parents/jada-pinkett-smiths-juggling-act/|accessdate=July 21, 2009|work=[[Child (magazine)|Child Magazine]]|publisher=[[Meredith Corporation]]}} and also attends the New Village Leadership Academy, which was co-founded by his parents in the Los Angeles suburb of [[Calabasas, California|Calabasas]].{{cite news|last=Wollman Rusoff|first=Jane|coauthors=|title=Jada Pinkett Smith returns to the tube on TNT|pages=|publisher=New York Times Syndicate/Reading Eagle|date=June 13, 2009|url=http://www.readingeagle.com/article.aspx?id=142873|accessdate=June 13, 2009}} Along with his siblings, Smith is a youth ambassador for [[Project Zambia]] in conjunction with the [[Hasbro]] corporation, which helps children orphaned by AIDS in Africa.{{cite web|url=http://www.pr-inside.com/actors-jaden-and-willow-smith-.join-r1516735.htm|title=Actors Jaden and Willow Smith Join Hasbro, Inc.âs PROJECT ZAMBI as Youth Ambassadors|accessdate=January 19, 2010|date=October 7, 2009|publisher=[[PR-inside.com]]}} ==Discography== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2"| Year ! rowspan="2"| Song ! colspan="9"| Peak chart pos ! rowspan="2"| Album |- !style="width:3.5em;font-size:80%"| [[Canadian Hot 100|CAN]]
